title: Tegan and Sara
itunes:title: Tegan and Sara
itunes:subtitle: PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey.Tegan and Sara."We three are the gay Rachels. We got trapped in our hair."Tegan and Sara, queer pop-icons and identical twins, catch up with Kate and Leisha, gay icon...
description:
PANTS with Kate Moennig and Leisha Hailey.

Tegan and Sara.


"We three are the gay Rachels. We got trapped in our hair."


Tegan and Sara, queer pop-icons and identical twins, catch up with Kate and Leisha, gay icons and BFFs.

It’s literally a gay pantheon.

They all met 15 years ago on set of The L Word, and their lives have been happily intertwining ever since.

Hear what happened when a grizzly gate-crashed a Tegan and Sara garden party, and our hosts re-create an acapella version of the Tegan and Sara hit Not Tonight,


Edited and produced in the UK by Rachel Shelley.

Follow us on Twitter @ThePantsPod

Follow us on Instagram ThePantsPod

Send us a question: pantspodcast@yahoo.com

Music: Carol Parra @csssuxxx

Artwork: Lovefoxxx

October 2020


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
